name: Nocturne and The Unseen Dream
description:
In the world of Nocturne, you play as the inquiry agent, Benny Macready. After receiving a  letter from one of his clients, Benny goes out into the night to uncover the mystery about famous J&R Manufacturing founder, Ray Mendelev. 

Meet a cast of strange and unique characters in this Lucas-Arts inspired point-n-click game! Look at beautiful QGA* rendered 640 x 400 landscapes, MIDI music, and high quality 8-bit mono sound! Enjoy the game that won countless "Finest Video Entertainment Product" and "Best Usage of Fish Splashing SFX"  awards!

*patented technology
